QuestData.Title: The Court of Winter
QuestData.Description:
My Court informs me that you bear an important message.
You may now deliver it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Give the Primus's message to the Winter Queen.
QuestData.RewardText: The Banished One stirs and Ardenweald's power withers in drought.

Objectives.Objective: Travel to the Heart of the Forest
